evidence.claim: ZOLL Data Systems utilizes AWS cloud services for its platform infrastructure.
The company emphasizes HIPAA compliance in its data handling practices.
ZOLL's platform integrates with EHR systems using HL7 standards.
The documentation mentions support for FHIR standards in data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: ZOLL Data Systems operates in healthcare data with EDI integration and uses APIs, relevant to X12 transactions.
